content.question: According to cognitive dissonance theory, human beings are motivated to

choices.label: Respond to an inborn need to pass their genes to the next generation
Maintain an optimal level of arousal
Satisfy basic needs such as hunger before proceeding to higher needs such as self-actualization
Reduced tensions produced by inconsistent thoughts

content.answer: Reduced tensions produced by inconsistent thoughts
